snippet: The trip by Christopher Nixon Cox, 100 years after President Richard M. Nixon’s birth, was organized to lionize both the president’s and the Communist Party’s accomplishments.
abstract: Christopher Nixon Cox, grandson of late Pres Richard M Nixon, retraces his grandfather's historic 1972 trip on 10-day visit to China; trip, timed for year of Nixon's 100th birthday, is carefully organized to lionize both president’s and Communist Party’s accomplishments.
lead_paragraph: The trip by Christopher Nixon Cox, 100 years after President Richard M. Nixon’s birth, was organized to lionize both the president’s and the Communist Party’s accomplishments.

headline.seo: In China, Nixon Grandson Commemorates 1972 Visit
headline.main: A Grandson Visits China in Footsteps of Nixon
headline.print_headline: A Grandson Visits China In Footsteps Of Nixon
